altTitles.ja: BJアレックス

description.en: Every night at 10, Dong-gyun locks himself up in his room, grabs a box of tissues, and watches a live cam boy show hosted by Alex, a BJ (broadcast jockey). Timid Dong-gyun admires not only Alex’s ripped body, but his candor in sharing his sexual experiences with viewers. One night, Dong-gyun downs too many drinks at a school networking event and passes out. When he wakes up, he’s in bed staring up at a shirtless hunk. A hunk who looks an awful lot like... Alex.
description.pl: Każdej nocy o 22, Donggyun zamyka się w swoim pokoju, bierze pudełko chusteczek i ogląda program na żywo prowadzony przez Alexa. Nieśmiały Donggyun podziwia nie tylko wyrzeźbione ciało Alexa, ale także jego szczerość w dzieleniu się swoimi doświadczeniami seksualnymi z widzami. Pewnej nocy Donggyun wypija zbyt wiele drinków na szkolnej impreziei traci przytomność. Kiedy się budzi, leży w łóżku i wpatruje się w faceta bez koszuli. Faceta, który bardzo przypomina mu... Alexa.
description.pt-br: Todas as noites às 22h, Dong-Gyun se tranca em seu quarto, pega uma caixa de lenços e assiste um show ao vivo apresentado por BJ Alex. O tímido Dong-Gyun admira não apenas o corpo sarado e gostoso de Alex, mas sua sinceridade em compartilhar suas experiências sexuais com os espectadores. Uma noite, Dong-Gyun acaba bebendo demais e desmaia. Quando acorda, ele da de cara com um gato sem camisa. Um gato que se parece muito com… Alex.

altTitles.ja: Suki na Hito no Mae de Jibaku suru Onnanoko
恋する自爆ちゃん

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.ja: 자비는 없습니다

description.en: Sierra witnesses her husband's secret meeting with her best friend Belieta. She is stabbed by her husband and closes her eyes. As Sierra, who was tired of life, feels free from her impending death, she hears a mysterious voice... "You can't escape Belieta." In her second life that she unwillingly began, Sierra vows revenge. This time, she will take everything from Belieta.

In the world where the sea level has risen, the sea has already covered the continent.   
In the world where the land can not be found anymore, the family of the boy, 'Bota', lives in a small boat and wanders around.   
  
I am looking for another 'man' somewhere and I am safe in the rules that my father has set.
description.vi: Trong một thế giới nơi mực nước biển đã dâng cao và đại dương đã bao phủ toàn bộ lục địa, đất liền không còn tồn tại nữa. Gia đình của cậu bé tên Bota sống trên một con thuyền nhỏ và lang thang khắp nơi. Tôi đang tìm kiếm một "người" nào đó ở đâu đó và an toàn trong những quy tắc mà cha tôi đã đặt ra.
description.pt-br: O mundo foi submerso e monstros marinhos governam a terra. Será que Bota e sua família irão conseguir escapar desse inferno marítimo? E quem diabos é Kana...?!

description.en:
He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…

---
- **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards
description.fr: Il se tenait au sommet du monde. Surpassant tout depuis la naissance dans l'art de l'épée. Mais le destin l'a laissé infirme quelques instants avant d'atteindre le sommet. Mais l'histoire continue et la légende renaîtra…
description.zh: 天下最风流的剑客，名曰沈三公子。 天下最有名的剑法，唤作万藏剑经。 天下最强大最神秘的地方，是为弃剑山庄。 每周六早上九点准时更新~

description.en:
Leah has been dreaming of a happy marriage. She has had two tries at her luck, but both times the engagements ended. When she got engaged for the third time she was determined that this time it was going to last. Even though she is determined, she keeps seeing a man called Julien with whom she got familiar prior to her engagement. Julien's proposal, combined with his kind personality and handsome face, made her swoon and she agreed to marry him.  

After their wedding, she was enjoying her honeymoon in Julien's estate, where she discovers traces of herself that she didn't know he had. She enters Julien's secret room that he had been hiding from her...

[Official Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59481128)
[Official Novel](https://ridibooks.com/account/login?return_url=%2Fbooks%2F809016837%3F_rdt_sid%3Dauthor%26_rdt_idx%3D4)

Note: The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel

altTitles.ja: 目つき悪い子かわいい子

altTitles.en: A Cute Girl With A Nasty Look
A Cute Girl With Nasty Look

altTitles.vi: A cute girl with nasty look

description.en:
This delinquent is stupid cute!

High schooler Tanaka-kun believes that scary girls are actually cute. Thus, sitting next to the delinquent Mizuno-san he strives to get closer to her. However, in addition to having a scary expression, she's the subject of many rumors and feared by her classmates!!

Although getting the cold shoulder at first, Tanaka's feverish offensive opens Mizuno's heart up bit by bit. But Tanaka's plan to help her fit in with their classmates during the school festival is threatened when disaster strikes!

(Translation of the Volume 1 synopsis on Amazon by KasketBox)

A twitter short by @hamita1220
description.vi: Cô gái du côn này thật là ngốc nghếch và đáng yêu! Học sinh trung học Tanaka-kun tin rằng những cô gái đáng sợ như vậy thực sự rất dễ thương. Vì vậy, ngồi cạnh Mizuno-san, một người bị coi là một kẻ du côn, cậu ấy đã cố gắng làm thân với cô ấy. Tuy nhiên, ngoài biểu cảm đáng sợ, cô ấy còn có rất nhiều tin đồn !! Mặc dù ban đầu nhận được một cái nhìn lạnh lùng, nhưng sự cố gắng của Tanaka đã mở ra trái tim của Mizuno từng chút một. Nhưng kế hoạch của Tanaka để giúp cô hòa nhập với các bạn cùng lớp trong lễ hội trường đang bị đe dọa khi thảm họa ập đến!
description.es-la:
Esta delincuente es estúpida y linda!

El estudiante Tanaka-kun cree que las chicas aterradoras son en realidad lindas. Y así, sentandose al lado de la delincuente Mizuno-san intenta hacerse más cercano a ella. Además de tener una cara aterradora, ella es el sujeto de muchos rumores y temida por sus compañeros!!

Apesar de recibir la ley del hielo al principio, la ofensiva de Tanaka abre poco a poco el corazón de Mizuno-san. Pero el plan de Tanaka para ayudarla a encajar con sus compañeros durante el festival escolar, es amenazado por un ataque sin aviso!

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス NINE PEAKS

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

title.en: Tsuihousareta Renkinjutsushi wa Mujikaku ni Densetsu to Naru Yandere Imouto (Oukoku no Shugoryuu) to Issho ni Henkyou de Shiawase ni Kurashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師は無自覚に伝説となる ヤンデレ妹（王国の守護竜）と一緒に辺境で幸せに暮らします！

altTitles.en: The Exiled Alchemist Unwittingly Becomes a Legend Living Happily on the Frontier with his Yandere Sister (The Guardian Dragon of the Kingdom)!

description.en:
One day, Mys, the eldest son of Duke Windsor, is sentenced by the king to be exiled to the border. The king claims that his secret visit to Valitra, the strongest dragon that protects the kingdom, is an attempt to treason against the kingdom. However, Valitra's guardian dragon is actually Mys' younger sister, Tinny, who was thought to have died four years ago! 

"Mys Nii-sama is the one who saved my life, the one who is worthy to rule everything in the world [Supreme Being]. Anyone who hurts Mys Nii-sama will be thrown into hell!" 

And the Kingdom is heading towards destruction, having incurred the wrath of its guardian dragon, Valitra... Meanwhile, on the border where Mys has become the ruler, his alchemy techniques are leading to unprecedented developments and making everyone happy - and once again, the kingdom is in danger of destruction.
description.id: Suatu hari, Mys, putra tertua dari Duke Windsor, dijatuhi hukuman oleh raja untuk diasingkan ke perbatasan. Raja mengklaim bahwa kunjungan rahasianya ke Valitra, naga terkuat yang melindungi kerajaan, merupakan usaha pengkhianatan terhadap kerajaan. Namun, naga penjaga Valitra sebenarnya adalah adiknya Meis, Tinny, yang dikira telah meninggal empat tahun lalu! “Mys Nii-sama adalah orang yang menyelamatkan hidupku, orang yang layak untuk memerintah segala sesuatu di dunia [Makhluk Tertinggi]. Siapapun yang menyakiti Mys Nii-sama akan ku lemparkan ke dalam neraka!” Dan Kerajaan sedang menuju kehancuran, setelah menimbulkan kemarahan naga pelindungnya, Valitra… Sementara itu, di perbatasan di mana Mys telah menjadi penguasa, teknik alkemisnya mengarah pada perkembangan yang belum pernah terjadi sebelumnya dan membuat semua orang bahagia – dan sekali lagi, kerajaan berada dalam bahaya kehancuran.
description.ja: まともな回復薬すら作れないことから、家族から無能扱いされていたウィンザー公爵家の長男・マイス。彼はある日、国王から辺境ベオグラードへの追放を言い渡されてしまう。王国を守るドラゴン【守護竜ヴァリトラ】のもとへ通っていたことが、王国への反逆に当たるというのだ。しかし実は、守護竜ヴァリトラの正体は4年前に死んだと思われていたマイスの妹ティニーであった――。「マイス兄様こそ私の命の恩人にして、この世のすべてを統べるに相応しい【至高にして至大であられるお方】です。マイス兄様を傷つける者は、この私が地獄に叩き落します！」

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!
description.ja: 人間に憧れた最弱魔物（スライム）が乗っ取ったのは、聖女だけど性格最悪な極悪令嬢・ジェリィの体だった！　折角人間に成ることが出来たのに、周りの人間たちから恨まれ嫌われているうえに、魔物（スライム）とバレたら即終了のバッドエンドまっしぐら…!?
description.ru: Самый слабый монстр (слайм), мечтающий стать человеком, вселяется в тело злодейки с ужасной репутацией! Если будет раскрыта её истинная сущность, то она будет немедленно уничтожена, поэтому она будет стремиться стать всеми любимой, чтобы жить безопасной и комфортной жизнью!

description.en: This museum's treasured collection is a slew of strange comics!
description.zh: 这个博物馆，珍藏着许多奇怪的漫画！

altTitles.ja: 冒険エレキテ島

description.en:
After her grandfather's death, Mikura chose to continue their island express courier service. 
With her seaplane and her adventurous cat, Endeavor, she lives life as she chooses. 
Soon Mikura becomes very interested in a mysterious island that seems to move around, according to a local legend. 
After some extensive effort to determine the island's whereabouts, 
she manages to get a brief glimpse of it from the sky. 
Now that she knows it's real, she's determined to find the island again, no matter what it takes.
  
[Kindle vers (English)](https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B07JKKWXTF?ref_=dbs_r_series&storeType=ebooks)

title.en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu

altTitles.ja: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中

altTitles.en: The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor
The Returnee Noble Lady in the Middle of Conquesting His Majesty the Dragon Emperor

altTitles.es: ¡Vence al Emperador Dragón en esta ronda, Señorita!

altTitles.zh: 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下

altTitles.en: Win Over the Dragon Emperor This Time Around, Noble Girl!

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Thư Trùng Sinh chinh phục Long Đế Bệ Hạ
小姐重生征服龍帝陛下 (Nom Script)

altTitles.id: Seorang Putri Yang Kembali Ke Masa Lalu Sedang Menaklukkan Kaisar Naga

altTitles.it: La nobildonna ritornata nel bel mezzo della conquista di Sua Maestà l'Imperatore Drago

description.en:
The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again!  
  
The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided!   
  
Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

title.en: Reikan Aru Youkya to Kowai Inkya

altTitles.ja: 霊感ある陽キャと怖い陰キャ

altTitles.ja-ro: Reikan Aru Yōkya to Kowai Inkya

altTitles.en: A Spiritual Positive Character and a Scary Negative Character
A Spiritual Extrovert and a Scary Introvert

altTitles.vi: Thằng hướng ngoại nhìn thấy được ma và thằng hướng nội trông sợ vỗn lài

description.en: Daily story about a spiritual positive character and a scary negative character

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
"You're amazing for being alive another day!"

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a "log-in bonus" every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

description.en: The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

altTitles.ja: バーサス

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)

**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

title.en: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Silent Sinner in Blue.

altTitles.de: Östliches Zitat des Flüchtigen Mondes ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

altTitles.en: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

altTitles.ja: 東方儚月抄 ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

description.en:
東方儚月抄 (romanized Touhou Bougetsushou, meaning Eastern Ephemeral Moon Vignette) is a loosely interconnected storyline about the Lunarians that includes Silent Sinner in Blue, Cage in Lunatic Runagate, and Inaba of the Moon and Inaba of the Earth.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pt:
Yukari Yakumo, a youkai das fronteiras, ela compareceu descontraída enquanto bebia o chá no Santuário Hakurei, ela pediu para que a sacerdotisa estudasse sobre a divinação para futuros eventos. A sacerdotisa achou a idéia maluca da Youkai e levou por brincadeira os planos da Youkai.  
Logo depois, Yukari montou uma invasão contra lua há mais de 1000 anos atrás, porém, o seu plano não deu certo, agora, ela pede auxilio para os Youkais residentes de Gensokyo para mais uma tentativa de invasão.

altTitles.ja: 怪獣少女ハナ
あさドラ！

altTitles.es-la: Una novela gráfica en serie: ¡Drama Matutino!

altTitles.ja: 連続漫画小説 あさドラ!

description.en: In 2020, a large creature rampages through Tokyo, destroying everything in its path. In 1959, Asa Asada, a spunky young girl from a huge family in Nagoya, is kidnapped for ransom—and not a soul notices. When a typhoon hits Nagoya, Asa and her kidnapper must work together to survive. But there’s more to her kidnapper and this storm than meets the eye.
description.es-la: En 2020, una gran criatura arrasa Tokio, destruyendo todo a su paso. En 1959, Asa Asada, una valiente joven de una gran familia de Nagoya, es secuestrada para pedir un rescate y nadie se da cuenta. Cuando un tifón golpea Nagoya, Asa y su secuestrador deben trabajar juntos para sobrevivir. Pero el secuestrador y la tormenta son más de lo que parece.
description.pt-br: Em 2020, uma grande criatura invade Tóquio, destruindo tudo em seu caminho. Em 1959, Asa Asada, uma jovem corajosa de uma família enorme em Nagoya, é sequestrada por resgate – e nem uma alma percebe. Quando um tufão atinge Nagoya, Asa e seu sequestrador devem trabalhar juntos para sobreviver. Mas há mais em seu sequestrador e nesta tempestade do que aparenta.

title.en: The Hunter Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.en: The Hunter Wants to Live in Peace

description.en: Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dump—eight years in the future. Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…

title.en: Nigoru Hitomi de Nani wo Negau - Highserk Senki

altTitles.ja: 濁る瞳で何を願う ハイセルク戦記
濁る瞳で何を願う

altTitles.ja-ro: Nigoru Hitomi de Nani wo Negau

altTitles.en: What Do You Wish For With Those Murky Eyes: Record of Highserk War
What Do You Wish for With Muddy Eyes: Record of Highserk War

altTitles.ru: Чего ты желаешь своим мутным взором?

altTitles.id: Apa yang Kau inginkan dengan mata berlumpur?

altTitles.en: What Do You Wish for With Muddy Eyes

description.en:
One day, Raizou ​​Takakura, an average salaryman, had a heart attack and his life ended that day. But, he got a second life in a different world.

Reincarnated with strong skills― wasn't what happened to him. Instead, he was reincarnated as a foot soldier in a small country, Highserk Empire, which is surrounded by large countries. With a new name, Walm, he was thrown into the frontlines of a war. Covered in blood and stench of death, along his comrades, he was slipping through the life-or-death situations.

An adventurer party with members who could use powerful magic, transferees with overwhelming power called the "heroes." In a deadly battle with them, Walm gradually developed his talent as a warrior which would've never awoken if he were to stay in times of peace. While his eyes becoming dark and muddy over time.
description.id:
Suatu hari, Raizou Takakura, seorang pegawai biasa, mengalami serangan jantung dan hidupnya berakhir hari itu. Tapi, dia mendapat kehidupan kedua di dunia yang berbeda.

Reinkarnasi dengan keterampilan yang kuat― tidak terjadi padanya, sebaliknya, dia bereinkarnasi sebagai prajurit di sebuah negara kecil, Kekaisaran Highserk, yang dikelilingi oleh negara-negara besar. Dengan nama baru, Walm, dia terlempar ke garis depan perang. Berlumuran darah dan bau kematian, bersama rekan-rekannya, dia tergelincir melalui situasi hidup atau mati.

Sebuah party petualang dengan anggota yang bisa menggunakan sihir yang kuat, penerima transfer dengan kekuatan luar biasa yang disebut "pahlawan."

Dalam pertempuran mematikan dengan mereka, Walm secara bertahap mengembangkan bakatnya sebagai seorang pejuang yang tidak akan pernah terbangun jika dia tinggal di masa damai. Sementara matanya menjadi gelap dan berlumpur seiring waktu―
description.ja:
平凡な会社員だった高倉頼蔵（たかくら　らいぞう）は、ある日、心筋梗塞によりその生涯を閉じた。
しかし、彼は異世界で第二の生を得る。


[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6680gq)  (jp)
description.ru:
Однажды у обычного офисного работника Райдзу Такакуры случился сердечный приступ, и в тот же день его жизнь оборвалась. Но мир одарил его новой жизнью в другом мире.

Он реинкарнировался не с сильными способностями, а просто перевоплотился в пехотинца из маленькой страны, империи Хайсерк, которая окружена большими государствами. С новым именем, Вальм, он был брошен на фронт войны. Покрытый кровью и смрадом смерти, вместе со своими товарищами он пробирался через ситуации жизни и смерти.

В смертельной схватке с ними Вальм постепенно развил свой талант воина, который никогда бы не пробудился, останься он в мирном городе. Но за все схватки его глаза со временем потемнели и помутнели...

description.en:
The power of Valhalla's warriors is called Saga. It is the mighty, magical power born from their achievements and deeds in their former lives. Thus, the more stories and legends of these warriors spread and linger in the hearts of many, the stronger their Saga becomes.

Tae Ho himself was certainly no warrior. However, he was the world's top professional gamer. In the game world of Dark Age, his character, Dragon Knight Kalsted could rightly be called a legend in his own right.

His achievements, his story.

All the accomplishments that the Dragon Knight Kalsted had accumulated in the game!
[Saga: Immortal Warrior] The story of the immortal warrior, Lee Tae Ho, unfolds on the battlefield of the gods, Valhalla. To put an end to Ragnarok, which threatens the world's very existence, a new Saga begins at this very moment.

title.en: Sister-sama no Oose no Mama ni

altTitles.ja: シスター様の仰せの魔々に

altTitles.ja-ro: Sister-sama no Ouse no Mama ni

description.en: One day, the demon Clod comes to high school student Sister Kris Ibarakawa. He says that he has a contract with Kris's estranged father to make her happy. He is very serious even for a demon, and says, "I will definitely make you happy," and uses various kinds of magic... Will Kris be able to follow the path of a pure and righteous sister?
description.pt-br: Um dia, o demônio Clodo chega até a estudante do ensino médio, Irmã Chris Ibarakawa. Ele diz que tem um contrato com o pai distante de Chris para fazê-la feliz. Ele é muito sério até mesmo para um demônio, e diz: “Com certeza vou te fazer feliz”, e usa vários tipos de magia... Será que Chris conseguirá seguir o caminho de uma irmã pura e justa?

title.en: Zenbu Kimi no Sei - Extras / After Story

altTitles.ja: ぜんぶきみの性
男にも女にも中学教師

altTitles.ja-ro: Otoko ni mo Onna ni mo Naru Chuugaku Kyoushi

altTitles.ja: どっちも女装するカップル♂

description.en: Extras and After Story of [Zenbu Kimi no Sei](https://mangadex.org/title/82476383-e6a9-41a7-b98c-87cc8be9efbb/zenbu-kimi-no-sei), mainly centred around Ryou and Nagisa. (the Official Raws are free to view)

title.en: Class Ten'i de Ore dake Haburareta no de, Doukyuusei Harem Tsukuru Koto ni shita

altTitles.ja: クラス転移で俺だけハブられたので、同級生ハーレム作ることにした

altTitles.en: Upon being Exiled from my Class I Decided to Make my Own Harem of my Classmates
Because I was Excluded Out of the Class Transfer, I Decided Make a Classmate Harem
After being Transported, I was Singled Out and Rejected by my Classmates so, I Made Them all Part of my Harem

description.en: When Kirishima Ran and his classmates were transported to another world they each received an ability. However the ability he received, [Sexual Lunatic], has caused nothing but trouble for him. His ability allows him to make any girl he comes in contact with his slave. Because of his ability, his classmates have shunned him and forced him to separate from them. With the fires of revenge burning inside his heart, Kirishima decides to overtake the class from the shadows. One by one he turns his classmates into slaves and fill his desires.
description.ja: クラスまるごと異世界転移で魔王討伐を目差せ!!…のはずが、女を魅了できる特殊スキルを手に入れてしまった霧島蘭は、その力を警戒したクラスメイトたちに追放されてしまう…。復讐＆生き残りのためにハーレムを作れ!?

title.en: Naori wa Shinai ga, Mashi ni Naru

altTitles.ja: なおりはしないが、ましになる

altTitles.zh: 虽然无法治愈，但是可以改善

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩

altTitles.ja-ro: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai-5 Shou - Mizu no Machi to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero — Começando uma Vida em Outro Mundo — Arco 5: A Metrópole da Água e o Poema do Herói

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

description.en:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
description.ja:
悪意が蠢く水門都市へ、集え歴戦の英雄たち。

『聖域』での戦いから一年、平穏な日々を送るナツキ・スバルだったが、王選候補者の一人、アナスタシアの招待により、一行は水門都市プリステラへと出発した。水の都で懐かしい面々と旧交を温めるスバル達。しかし、その裏では悪意が蠢いていて――。
description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.ja: 路傍のフジイ

description.en:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... 

This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!

altTitles.ja: 凪のお暇

description.en:
Ooshima Nagi is an 28 year old office lady always trying to read the mood and fit in. Berated by her boss, taken advantage of by her colleagues, and betrayed by her boyfriend, Nagi quits her job and severs contact with everyone in her social circle in order to restart her life from scratch. Will Nagi be able to change herself, or will she fall back into her old ways?  
  
**Note**: Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Awards (2018).  
Nominated for the 12th Manga Taishou Awards (2019).  
Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Awards (2020).

This is a original story set in the world of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure. In 1992, a small town in Canada called Planck's Creek is faced with the untimely death of a young woman, Patsy Paula. In this town that is a lot stranger than it seems, her childhood friends take on a bizarre adventure to unravel the mystery of her death.

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.ja: ごめん, 好きです

description.en: Rie and Yuri have been friends since childhood. Living together every day, Yuri thinks Rie needs a boyfriend. Does she even need one?
description.pt-br: Rie e Yuri são amigos desde criança. Convivendo todos os dias juntos, Yuri pensa que Rie precisa de um namorado. Será que ela precisa de um mesmo?

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

title.en: The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child

altTitles.ja: 女騎士とケモミミの子

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Kishi to Kemomimi no Ko

altTitles.ja: Female knight and the Kemonomimi child

altTitles.en: Female Knight and the Kemonomimi Child
The Female Knight and the Beast-Eared Child

description.en: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
description.ja: 魔物が蔓延り殺伐とした異世界。女騎士オリビアは、弟子の獣人ノアと暮らしていた。強く生きる2人の絆に癒され、キュンとする師弟の成長冒険譚。

altTitles.ja: チラチラ

description.en:
“This is not enough!”

Sweat running down her soft skin, her flushed cheeks, her breath becoming rougher and rougher… Losing track of time in a private room, just the two of you, this evening you and her will have each other to your hearts' content…

A slightly naughty sauna comedy, here we come!
description.ja:
これじゃ、ととのいません！

柔肌を伝う汗、紅潮する頬、徐々に荒くなっていく吐息…
二人きりの密室で時間を忘れ、今夜はあの子と心ゆくまで──
ちょっぴりエッチなサウナコメディ、開幕！

altTitles.es-la: Una princesa que trabaja duro por su favorito

altTitles.en: The Princess is Secretly a Fan

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m the Princess of the Empire, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s honor is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’

altTitles.ja: ゆめねこねくと

description.en: On the day of the entrance ceremony, Yuuhi Takamiya caught a mysteriously high fever and was bedridden for a week. To camouflage the fact that he was a loner, he creates a bookworm persona that becomes firmly established both for himself and others. Hearing his despair over wanting friends, a clumsy alien called Nano arrives from space to push some dubious goods on him... With Nano's outrageous products, Yuuhi's school life spirals into even greater chaos!
description.ja: 高校入学初日から一週間を謎の高熱で病欠。孤立していることを隠すために作り上げた読書キャラが自他ともに定着。高宮遊日は悲嘆に暮れていた！そんな遊日の「友達がほしい！」という悲痛な叫びに応えるように、ポコツン星人のナノが宇宙から営業（押し売り）にやってきて……。ナノのトンデモ商品によって、遊日の高校生活は更なる混迷を極めていく!!かわいくて、ちょっぴり刺激的な、宇宙スケールのドタバタコメディ開幕!

altTitles.ja: 空手小公子こひなたみのる
空手小公子小日向海流

description.en: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru

altTitles.ja: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている

altTitles.id: Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak

altTitles.en: Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.

description.en:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
description.id:
Aku tiba-tiba bisa melihat tingkat rasa suka dari gadis yang kusukai.──Aku tidak punya keberanian untuk menyatakan cinta pada teman masa kecilku, Marika-chan. Suatu hari, aku membuat permohonan yang sangat kuat pada bintang jatuh: "Aku berharap bisa memahami perasaan orang lain, seperti di dalam game romansa." Dan ternyata, permohonan itu terkabul...!?

Di atas kepala para gadis di kelasku, muncul status bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka. Dalam kebingunganku melihat pemandangan aneh ini, aku memutuskan untuk memeriksa status barnya Marika-chan. Namun, status barnya justru melebihi batas, berubah menjadi status bar "neraka" yang benar-benar kacau...!?

Marika-chan, kalau kau tidak menyukaiku, kenapa kau begitu baik padaku...?
──Apa rahasia sebenarnya di balik sikap Marika-chan yang manis dan menggemaskan? Apakah dia benar-benar membenciku!? Atau mungkin sebenarnya...!?
description.ja:
あらすじ・内容
好きな子からの好感度が見えるようになりました。──幼馴染の茉莉花ちゃんに告白する勇気の無い僕。ある日、流れ星に強く願った「恋愛ゲームみたいに相手の気持ちがわかるようになりますように」すると、その願いは叶ってしまい…!?クラスの女子達に浮かぶ好感度メーター。非現実な光景に戸惑いながらも茉莉花ちゃんのを見に行くと、下限突破した地獄のメーターになっていて…!?茉莉花ちゃん、僕のこと嫌いなのにどうしてそんなに優しかったの…？――裏アリ可愛い茉莉花ちゃんの隠された本音は？本当にキライなの!?それとも…!?

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.
